definition: first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°

sentences.english: He is the ideal player for Juve to sign for their return to Serie A.
sentences.chinese: 他是尤文重返甲级联赛后值得签下的理想球员。

sentences.english: Hoffenheim were instantly dismissed by many as cannon fodder after their promotion last season.
sentences.chinese: 霍芬海姆上赛季升入甲级伊始就被众球队当做是炮灰。

sentences.english: Hopefully, I will be able to repay them with promotion to Serie A.
sentences.chinese: 我希望能回报他们，我要帮助球队升回甲级。

sentences.english: Approve of qualification of ministry of classics country construction plans to design an unit for first class.
sentences.chinese: 经国家建设部资格核准为甲级规划设计单位。

sentences.english: Currently, nearly one hundred Grade-A office buildings as well as a concentrated consulate district exist within this area.
sentences.chinese: 不仅有近百栋甲级写字楼，还专设驻沪领馆区。

sentences.english: The football team's mascot is a goat.
sentences.chinese: 那个足球队已晋升为甲级队。

sentences.english: They were promoted to the First Division last season.
sentences.chinese: 上个赛季他们晋升为甲级队。

sentences.english: Average Grade A office rentals are predicted to rise 19% over the next 12 months.
sentences.chinese: 预未十二个月甲级办公平均租升幅约19%。

sentences.english: Executing these war criminals 10,000 times would not atone for their sins.
sentences.chinese: 即使这些甲级战犯死一万遍也不能洗刷他们的罪恶。

sentences.english: It was the opening day of our return to Division One .
sentences.chinese: 这是我们重返甲级行列的首个比赛日。

sentences.english: The Japanese leaders insisted on visiting the Yasukuni Shrine that worships Class-A war criminals during World War II.
sentences.chinese: 日本领导人坚持参拜供奉甲级战犯的靖国神社。

sentences.english: IM I remember playing this year just from League up bar.
sentences.chinese: IM我记得是今年刚刚从甲级联赛打上来的吧。

sentences.english: I hope I can play a role in a possible promotion to the Eredivisie.
sentences.chinese: 我希望我能为球队升入荷兰甲级联赛出一份力。

sentences.english: McCreadie, however, never got the chance to test his ability in the first division.
sentences.chinese: 一直没有机会在甲级联赛展现他的才华。

sentences.english: Rovers lost 4-1 and began their long exile from the First Division.
sentences.chinese: 流浪者队以1比4落败，从此开始长期无缘甲级联赛。

sentences.english: Grade A office capital values and average rentals remained the same as the previous quarter.
sentences.chinese: 本季甲级办公租和售价与上季持平。

definition: echelon (military)/(of an organisation) group of persons of one level or grade
geographical area of command/(PLA) military district
wing (of an air force)/sports team representing a combination of entities (e.g. United Korea)
New Armies (modernized Qing armies, trained and equipped according to Western standards, founded after Japan's victory in the First Sino-Japanese War in 1895)
